title: 108_hr1913
content: Rural Housing Tax Credit Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a credit for the purchase of a principal residence by a first-time rural homebuyer. Establishes credit limitations based upon: (1) adjusted gross income. And (2) tax. Provides for credit recapture in the event of: (1) certain sales, or (2) failure to use as a principal residence.
